review_title: An amazing and inspiring place to work.
pros: Its inspiring to work for an organisation who really cares about and supports its staff.
cons: Statutory funding is a challenge, however, the Fundraising and Retail teams do a great job generating income so that we can continue to give end of life care to our community when they need it.

review_title: Great place to work and volunteer
job_title: Human Resources Director in Maidstone, England
pros: Professional and caring organisation. Many staff benefits than in other healthcare settings - free parking, subsidised meals etc
cons: Lack of statutory funding hinders ability to offer a wider range of much needed services

job_title: Head of Nursing in Canterbury, England
pros:
Excellent standard of care delivery
free parking
subsidised food
access to high quality education and training opportunities
cons: Emotionally challenging but lots of support with this

pros: Lovely welcoming atmosphere. Colleagues are so friendly. Working for a charity feels rewarding. Hours are flexible.
cons: Anti-social hours but that is due to shift patterns and business needs
